posts.text: 🚀 Exciting News! 🚀 We are thrilled to announce the launch of our Fin One (Angel One web ) _KYC Customer Acquisition Campaign starting 1st September. 🎯 📌 Campaign Details: Model: Cost Per Acquisition (CPA) – Performance-based Payout: ₹300 per verified KYC completion GEO: Pan India Target Audience: 18–25 yrs (College Graduates, Freshers, First-time Investors) Soft KPI: 2% traded Reporting: Alternate day Payment Term: Weekly 📞 For more details / collaboration: 📲 WhatsApp: 8813064500 📧 Email: kapilkumar@uniqdigitalmedia.com This campaign is focused on empowering young India to start their investment journey while creating a strong performance-driven opportunity for our partners. 👉 Let’s connect and collaborate to make this campaign a success! hashtag #FinOne hashtag #DigitalMarketing hashtag #PerformanceMarketing hashtag #AffiliateMarketing hashtag #CustomerAcquisition hashtag #KYC hashtag #InvestSmart

✨ My Father’s Missed Opportunity Became My Life’s Mission In 1990, my father told me: “I could have bought land in Mumbai for just a few thousand… today it’s worth crores.” That regret stayed with me. It made me realize — the real reason people miss wealth is not lack of intent, but lack of financial literacy. Four years ago, I left my role as Co-Founder of WorkIndia to dedicate myself to financial education. This journey recently led me to be recognized as a SIP Achiever 🏆 — but for me, the award is not the destination. The true reward is seeing families become confident investors and individuals taking control of their future. 👉 Don’t wait until it’s too late. Start investing now. The best time was yesterday, the second-best is today. What financial lesson has shaped your journey? Thank you to Aashish P Sommaiyaa Manish Kothari hashtag #FinancialLiteracy hashtag #InvestSmart hashtag #WealthCreation hashtag #StartInvestment

🚀 𝗧𝗲𝘀𝘁 𝗕𝗲𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗲 𝗬𝗼𝘂 𝗜𝗻𝘃𝗲𝘀𝘁 What if you could 𝗰𝗿𝗲𝗮𝘁𝗲 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗼𝘄𝗻 𝗽𝗼𝗿𝘁𝗳𝗼𝗹𝗶𝗼, 𝗮𝗻𝗮𝗹𝘆𝘇𝗲 𝗽𝗲𝗿𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗺𝗮𝗻𝗰𝗲 and 𝗯𝗮𝗰𝗸𝘁𝗲𝘀𝘁 all in one place, instantly? Well, now you can. 💡 At Kalpi Capital, we just went live with our newest feature: 👉 Portfolio Creation 👉 Performance Analysis 👉 Backtesting Whether you’re a curious investor or a seasoned professional, this is your chance to experience 𝗱𝗮𝘁𝗮-𝗱𝗿𝗶𝘃𝗲𝗻 𝗶𝗻𝘃𝗲𝘀𝘁𝗶𝗻𝗴 at its best. ⚡ 𝗟𝗶𝗺𝗶𝘁𝗲𝗱-𝘁𝗶𝗺𝗲 𝗹𝗮𝘂𝗻𝗰𝗵 𝗼𝗳𝗳𝗲𝗿: It’s 𝗙𝗥𝗘𝗘 for all users — but only for a short while. Don’t wait. 🔗 Try it now on kalpicapital.com hashtag #PortfolioBacktesting hashtag #QuantInvesting hashtag #AIInvesting hashtag #SystematicInvesting hashtag #KalpiCapital hashtag #WealthTech hashtag #InvestSmart

🏡 RERA – Building Trust in Bhubaneswar’s Real Estate 🏡 Discover how RERA-approved residential projects in Bhubaneswar are transforming the market with unmatched transparency, accountability, and timely delivery. ✨ For homebuyers, it means peace of mind and security. For investors, it ensures credibility and long-term growth. 📈 we believe trust is the strongest foundation of every dream home. 🏠 📖 Read our latest article to explore why RERA matters and how it’s shaping the future of real estate in Bhubaneswar. https://lnkd.in/eQj4g_TT ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- hashtag #RERA hashtag #RERABhubaneswar hashtag #BhubaneswarRealEstate hashtag #OdishaRealEstate hashtag #MahodadhiHomes hashtag #Transparency hashtag #Accountability hashtag #TimelyDelivery hashtag #Homebuyers hashtag #DreamHome hashtag #InvestSmart hashtag #PropertyInvestment hashtag #LuxuryLiving hashtag #SmartInvestment hashtag #NewProjectLaunch hashtag #FutureReady hashtag #UrbanLiving hashtag #RealEstateIndia hashtag #RealEstateInvestment hashtag #HousingForAll hashtag #PropertyGoals hashtag #SustainableLiving

💡 Finance Tip of the Day Your money has 3 choices: 1️⃣ Sit idle in a savings account → 💤 Loses value to inflation 2️⃣ Get stuck in debt repayments → 🔗 Limits growth 3️⃣ Work for you through investments → 🚀 Builds wealth 👉 Smart money is not about how much you earn, but how wisely you manage and grow it. Ask yourself today: Is my money working harder than me? hashtag #FinanceKnowledge hashtag #MoneyManagement hashtag #WealthCreation hashtag #InvestSmart
